origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicDataAPI.get_policy_changes', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest policy changes and interest rate movements for a specified region and data type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which to retrieve the policy changes, e.g., global, specific_country.'}, {'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of economic data to retrieve, e.g., interest_rates, fiscal_policies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_data', 'description': 'The latest policy changes and interest rate movements for the specified region and data type.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicDataAPI.get_policy_changes, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'global', 'data_type'是'interest_rates'.
